amendment.description: To exclude metals from regulatory oversight by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 877 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 877 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 876. (consideration: CR S7594-7599; text: CR S7594) To exclude metals from regulatory oversight by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 877 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 876.
